General.Name: Guangdong Anda Automation Solutions Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guangdong Anda Automation Solutions Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, and manufactures fluid control equipment, plasma equipment, curing and assembly equipment, and other intelligent manufacturing equipment worldwide. The company offers glue dispensing machine, coating machine, plasma cleaning machine, curing furnace, medical equipment, assembly machine, and ADA intelligent platform used in smart homes, semiconductor, automotive electronics, and other industries. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Dongguan, China.
General.Address: No. 17, Xiangxidong District Road, Dongguan, China, 523430
